thread.title: The Martian: Twitter reactions
thread.title_full: The Martian: Twitter reactions - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: The Martian: Twitter reactions
text:
The Martian has opened to positive reviews and Tweetizen are raving about the film already. Here's what they had to say...
Positive tweet
Shot in 3D, #TheMartian is a fully immersive and transportive experience in a spectacular visual setting.
— Vera Sweeney (@VeraSweeney) October 4, 2015 Funny tweets Going to see #TheMartian . Love movies about space, but finding intelligent life on Earth would be real science fiction.
— Dave Rubin (@RubinReport) October 4, 2015 Saving Private Ryan, Interstellar & The Martian are all trying to tell us one important message. Never, ever leave Matt Damon alone anywhere
— Neil Kaplan (@NeKap) October 3, 2015 The aliens in The Martian reminded me a little of Jar Jar, but their basketball playing and pop culture quips saved it for me.
— Mike McMahan (@pleaseprint) October 4, 2015 Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
